original_text: When the four men reached the edge of the camp, they went into one of the tents. They ate and they drank what was there. They carried away silver and gold and clothes. They went away and they hid those things. Then they came back and they went into another tent. They took the valuable things from there too and they hid them.
korean_text: 그 나병환자들이 진영 끝에 이르자 한 장막에 들어가서 먹고 마시고 거기서 은과 금과 의복을 가지고 가서 감추고 다시 와서 다른 장막에 들어가 거기서도 가지고 가서 감추니라

sentences.original_text: When the four men reached the edge of the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 네 사람이 진 가장자리에 이르렀을 때

sentences.original_text: they went into one of the tents
They ate and they drank what was there
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 거기에 있던 것을 먹고 마셨다

sentences.original_text: They carried away silver and gold and clothes
They went away and they hid those things
and they went into another tent
They took the valuable things from there too
